Name: Mocha Martini
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
FLOAT cream in centre of cocktail.
Garnish with a dusting of chocolate powder.
Review: Made with great espresso, this drink is a superb, richly flavoured balance of sweet and bitter.
Nutrition: One serving of Mocha Martini contains 240 calories
